cn.jmessage.api.resource

类 ResourceClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.jmessage.api.common.BaseClient
      • cn.jmessage.api.resource.ResourceClient

  • public class ResourceClient
extends BaseClient

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ResourceClient(java.lang.String appkey, java.lang.String masterSecret) 
      ResourceClient(java.lang.String appkey, java.lang.String masterSecret, HttpProxy proxy) 
      ResourceClient(java.lang.String appkey, java.lang.String masterSecret, HttpProxy proxy, JMessageConfig config)
      Create a JMessage Base Client

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      DownloadResult downloadFile(java.lang.String mediaId)
      Download file with mediaId, will return DownloadResult which include url.
      UploadResult uploadFile(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String fileType)
      Upload file, only support image file(jpg, bmp, gif, png) currently, file size should not larger than 8M.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ResourceClient

        public ResourceClient(java.lang.String appkey,
              java.lang.String masterSecret)

      • ResourceClient

        public ResourceClient(java.lang.String appkey,
              java.lang.String masterSecret,
              HttpProxy proxy)

      • ResourceClient

        public ResourceClient(java.lang.String appkey,
              java.lang.String masterSecret,
              HttpProxy proxy,
              JMessageConfig config)
        Create a JMessage Base Client
        参数:
        appkey - The KEY of one application on JPush.
        masterSecret - API access secret of the appKey.
        proxy - The proxy, if there is no proxy, should be null.
        config - The client configuration. Can use JMessageConfig.getInstance() as default.

    • 方法详细资料

      • downloadFile

        public DownloadResult downloadFile(java.lang.String mediaId)
                            throws APIConnectionException,
                                   APIRequestException
        Download file with mediaId, will return DownloadResult which include url.
        参数:
        mediaId - Necessary
        返回:
        DownloadResult
        抛出:
        APIConnectionException - connect exception
        APIRequestException - request exception

      • uploadFile

        public UploadResult uploadFile(java.lang.String path,
                      java.lang.String fileType)
                        throws APIConnectionException,
                               APIRequestException
        Upload file, only support image file(jpg, bmp, gif, png) currently, file size should not larger than 8M.
        参数:
        path - Necessary, the native path of the file you want to upload
        fileType - should be "image" or "file" or "voice"
        返回:
        UploadResult
        抛出:
        APIConnectionException - connect exception
        APIRequestException - request exception
